Volcanic eruption in Iceland continues. In each country we care for Japanese who have been stuck, but we also provide support for foreign travelers who can not return home in Japan. In addition to offering blankets and snacks, the hotel's mediation and a day trip to nearby began today. I pray that the eruption will fall as soon as possible.

Yesterday I took advantage of the lunch time and exchanged opinions with movie director Yoji Yamada about the future of movies and culture. In the long run, I think the power of the country is the power of culture. As a country, as a society, we will think and act on what we should do to enhance "cultural capabilities" of Japan.
